title: Secure Multi-Factor Authentication (MFA)
summary: Implement multi-factor authentication to enhance user login security for the banking portal.
description: Develop and deploy a secure multi-factor authentication mechanism that requires customers to verify their identity using a combination of password, OTP, and biometric credentials where supported. This feature ensures compliance with financial data protection standards and prevents unauthorized access. Implement adaptive security detection for suspicious logins, session management, and account recovery workflows, offering both convenience and maximum protection for users.

title: Personalized Banking Dashboard
summary: Create a tailored, real-time user dashboard displaying relevant financial products and account details.
description: Design and implement a dynamic dashboard that displays account balances, recent transactions, and personalized product offerings based on the user's eligibility and transaction history. Incorporate backend API integrations for real-time data synchronization, allowing customers to view all pertinent banking information from one unified interface. The dashboard should highlight actionable items, offer quick navigation to key services, and promote relevant financial opportunities while maintaining a clean and intuitive user interface.

title: Responsive Multi-Device Portal Interface
summary: Deliver a responsive portal interface ensuring a consistent user experience across devices.
description: Develop a modern, responsive web interface that adapts seamlessly across desktops, tablets, and mobile devices. The UI should ensure consistency in functionality and design across all platforms, with particular attention to accessibility (WCAG 2.1 compliance), ease of navigation, and performance optimization. Ensure mobile responsiveness without compromising security or usability, enabling customers to manage their banking activities efficiently anytime, anywhere.

title: Digital Account Opening and Service Request Workflows
summary: Develop guided workflows enabling customers to open accounts and request service modifications online.
description: Implement comprehensive digital workflows that allow customers to initiate account openings or service requests directly from the portal. Automate eligibility checks, document validation, and compliance verifications to ensure a paperless onboarding experience. The workflow should minimize user input through intelligent field pre-fill, offer clear progress indicators, and integrate backend approval triggers. Provide customers with simple and efficient multi-step processes that significantly reduce manual intervention and turnaround time.

title: Save and Resume Applications
summary: Enable customers to save incomplete applications and resume them later from any device.
description: Introduce functionality for users to securely save the progress of partially completed applications or requests. Employ encryption to protect in-progress data and link saved forms to user profiles for cross-device accessibility. Implement automatic progress saving, display remaining steps, and send reminders for completion via email or SMS notifications. This functionality enhances user experience by allowing flexibility and reducing process abandonment.

title: Secure Document Upload and Processing
summary: Allow customers to securely upload and manage documents required for verification and requests.
description: Develop a secure document upload system integrated with verification workflows for identity confirmation, account requests, and service modifications. Set encryption for data transit and storage, enforce file type and size restrictions, and include real-time upload confirmation notifications. Integrate automated review mechanisms, compliance-level document tracking, and validation tools to ensure authenticity and regulatory adherence.

title: Real-Time Status Tracking and Notifications
summary: Provide real-time updates and alerts for submitted applications and service requests.
description: Implement an event-driven system that allows customers to monitor the status of their service requests or account applications in real time. Integrate notification services via email, SMS, and in-portal alerts for every stage of processing. Ensure full transparency by visualizing progress within the customer dashboard. Enable customers to receive alerts for approvals, pending actions, and completions, fostering engagement and trust.

title: Comprehensive Interaction History and Audit Trail
summary: Maintain an immutable record of all user interactions for transparency and compliance.
description: Establish a secure, encrypted audit trail system to record every user activity, including logins, requests, document uploads, and modifications. Provide customers with a summarized interaction history while granting administrators access to detailed logs for compliance and regulatory audits. Ensure all logs are immutable, timestamped, and protected in line with financial security guidelines. This will strengthen accountability while offering transparent access records.

title: Core Banking Integration Layer
summary: Integrate the self-service portal with the bank’s core systems for real-time data exchange.
description: Develop a secure integration layer using APIs and middleware to synchronize the portal with the bank’s core systems. Ensure efficient two-way data exchange, enabling real-time updates for customer profiles, account balances, and transaction information. Incorporate failover management, API security keys, and rate limiting to maintain reliability, scalability, and consistency across all customer activities while ensuring compliance with regulatory and data integrity standards.

title: Role-Based Access Control (RBAC)
summary: Implement access control mechanisms based on user roles and authorization levels.
description: Design and enforce a role-based access control system ensuring customers and bank staff access only authorized features and data. Define roles for customers, administrators, and operations teams with appropriate permissions. Integrate RBAC with authentication systems, automate privilege management, and maintain an audit trail for all access modifications. The framework ensures data confidentiality, operational safety, and compliance with internal policies.

title: Dedicated Portal Database and Performance Optimization
summary: Deploy an independent, high-performance database architecture to support portal operations.
description: Set up a separate, secure database managing user data, workflows, and document storage independently from the core banking system. Implement caching, indexing, and load balancing techniques for optimized performance. Improve reliability with automated backups, data encryption, and disaster recovery mechanisms. Establish monitoring for performance metrics and alerts to ensure continuous availability, scalability, and smooth integration with the bank’s environment.
